text: Hii everyone. I have created two blog-listing templates, but on changing the blog-listing template it is showing the same template. can anyone help me in this issue

Hi <@U038RRH6SS1> If you are new to HubSpot I will advise you to have a quick overview and get to know the key concepts before you start building your own templates and themes. Here is the doc which you can refer <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/key-concepts> I Hope this helps:slightly_smiling_face:
it could be a log of things. Do your templates have the same dnd area name?
The theme editor is not refresh on changes in the theme settings editor â€“ even when I click apply changes. Is this happening for anyone else?
Hello. Sorry for the delay. What was your original question? I've lost it. I know it was in a thread
yes <@U3T21PDBK> I have two blog-listing template with different name .
